creditline: Gift of Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom in honor of Stephen R. Nelson
medium: Chalk pastel on pale gray paper
provenance: [Parke-Bernet Galleries, New York]; [Kraushaar Galleries, New York, until 1970 (sold to Hillstrom)]; Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom, St. Paul, 1970-93; given to MIA, 1993.
title: Finishing Touches
